title: Facing it: my friend's an alcoholic
creator_credit: William Haugse, George McQuilkin and Churchill Films
brief_description: Terry, 17, has a drinking and drug problem and his friend, A.J., is being drawn into it. A.J. at first covers for Terry, then tries to intervene. Finally he realises, with the assistance of Terry’s girlfriend, that they need outside help.
